citation.article-title: Transfer of Bacillus ehimensis and Bacillus chitinolyticus to the genus Paenibacillus with emended descriptions of Paenibacillus ehimensis comb. nov. and Paenibacillus chitinolyticus comb. nov.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Description of Paenibacillus ehimensis (Kuroshima et al. 1996) comb. nov.
Paenibacillus ehimensis (e.hi.menâ€²sis. N. L. masc. adj. ehimensis referring to Ehime Prefecture, Japan, the source of the soil samples from which the organisms were isolated).
Basonym: Bacillus ehimensis Kuroshima et al. 1996.
The description is the same as that given by Kuroshima et al. (1996).
